page.title: 07SAINT OSWALD'S CHURCH
page.content: THE CHURCH IS USED FOR WEDDINGS FUNERALS AND CHRISTENINGS AND REGULAR SERVICES TAKE PLACE THERE EVERY SUNDAY.THERE IS ALSO A SUNDAY SCHOOL WHICH IS HELD EACH WEEK AND ABOUT 20 TO 30 CHILDREN ATTEND.INSIDE THE CHURCH ARE SOME ANCIENT OBJECTS. ONE IS THE{RUNIC STONE}. THIS IS A STONE PILLAR WITH STRANGE MARKINGS. THESE MAY BE SNAKES, THE SUN AND THE DEVIL OR THE GARDEN OF EDEN . THE RUNIC STONE WAS FOUND DURING REPAIR WORK.THE CHURCH IS LARGE AND EXPENSIVE TO RUN SO FUND RAISING EVENTS ARE HELD,SUCH AS JUMBLE SALES AND MINI-MARKETS. OTHER MONEY COMES FROM COLLECTIONS AND SOMETIMES WHEN PEOPLE DIE THEY LEAVE MONEY TO THE CHURCH. THE OLD{CHURCH SCHOOL}NEARBY IS NOW A YOUTH CENTRE AND THE OLD{ {VICARAGE}HAS BEEN REPAIRED AND IS AN OLD PEOPLE'S HOME.
